name: vinizinho's mystical drop
description:
A local network game where you have to match colors faster than your opponent.

A short test that I made over one week to understand better how Unity handles networking. I wanted to do this for a while now but couldn't find the motivation: it only came to me when I understood that I could try it out by copying Magical Drop - a series that I became enamored with a few months ago just seeing a screenshot of it. I don't think that I did it justice but, again, I didn't really try to.

As with vinizinho's battleships, the local network limits it by a lot, so I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. I made neither the game design nor the art assets (except for the title screen, and the circles). Again, this was just a learning project. But it's a thing I made, and it deserves to be here just as much as everything else.

Sorry for the lame gif on the right, I couldn't find anyone to play this with me! You can find the code here.

ASSETS:

  • Cute Knight by goglilol
  • Sound Effects by SubspaceAudio
  • Main song is a Spyro 3 song. Please understand
